## Import libraries

```{r}
#| warning: false
#| message: false
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)

```

```{r}
#| include: false
# Return the first and last 6 lines of starwars
head(starwars)
tail(starwars)
# Return the dimsions of the starwars df
dim(starwars)
# Return summary statistics
summary(starwars)


```

```{r}
#| fig-cap: "BMI of starwars characters"
ggplot(starwars, aes(x = height, y = mass)) +
  geom_point()
```

```{r}
ggplot(starwars, aes(x = height)) +
  geom_histogram(color = "red", fill = "purple")
```

```{r}
sw_height_mean <- mean(starwars$height, na.rm = TRUE)
sw_height_median <- median(starwars$height, na.rm = TRUE)
sw_height_var <- var(starwars$height, na.rm = TRUE)
sw_height_sd <- sd(starwars$height, na.rm = TRUE)


```

-   The mean height of starwars caracters is `r sw_height_mean`
